content: simple yet effective a super simple cowl by tin can knits sometimes a beautiful skein of yarn cries sizing short long out for something simple this cowl is finished measurements 20 45 around 10 tall as easy as can be perfect for a quick and materials satisfying knit ravelry cast on yarn 200 400 yards dk weight yarn sample shown in sweet fiber cashmere dk in marshland needles us #6 / 4mm 16 32 circular needles or as required to meet gauge gauge 22 sts & 28 rounds / 4 in stockinette notions darning needle how do i find tutorials on how knit at www tincanknits com/support html pattern abbreviations cast on 110 248 sts pm and join for working in the k - knit round p - purl rounds 1-3 purl pm - place marker rounds 4-12 knit st s - stitch es work these 12 rounds until piece measures 9 75 from cast-on work rounds 1-3 once more bind off all stitches loosely finishing weave in ends and wet block your cowl pull it on to keep the cool fall air at bay simple yet effective cowl from tin can knits 2 © tin can knits 2015 www tincanknits com in-depth tutorials excellent support fabulous free patterns join us
